backupSettings.title: Backup Settings
backupSettings.restoreSuccessReload: Since the database has been changed, you need to restart the application immediately for the new data to take effect.
backupSettings.confirmRestoreDesc: Restoring backup will overwrite all current data. Are you sure you want to continue?

wsl.title: WSL Config Sync Settings

wsl.wslPathShouldUseForwardSlash: WSL path should use forward slashes (/)
wsl.continueSaveQuestion: Do you want to continue saving?

proxy.title: Network Proxy
proxy.hint: Supports HTTP and SOCKS5 proxies, with optional username and password, e.g., http://user:pass@proxy.example.com:8080

about.title: About
about.updateCompleteRestart: The app will restart automatically to complete the update
about.updateFailedMessage: Auto-update failed, please go to GitHub Actions to download the latest version

common.disableAppliedConfigWarning: Applied configuration cannot be disabled. Switch to another config first.

notes.title: Notes
notes.confirmDelete: Are you sure to delete this note?

opencode.title: OpenCode Configuration
opencode.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete provider "{{name}}"? Associated models will also be deleted.
opencode.emptyText: No configuration yet, click the button above to add a provider or sync from settings

modal.title: Customize Configuration File Path
modal.description: App settings have the highest priority. Configuration changes will be saved to this file.
modal.envWarningDesc: This tool only writes configuration to the specified path. To have OpenCode read from this path, you must manually set the OPENCODE_CONFIG environment variable to point to this file.
modal.placeholder: Enter or select configuration file path

configParseError.title: Configuration File Parse Error
configParseError.description: The OpenCode configuration file exists but has invalid JSON format. You can manually fix the file, or back it up and recreate it.
configParseError.confirmBackupContent: This will rename the current configuration file to a backup (e.g., .bak.20240115_143052), after which you can reconfigure.

modelSettings.title: Model Settings
modelSettings.smallModelHint: For lightweight tasks like title generation
modelSettings.noModels: No models available, please add a provider first

provider.title: Providers
provider.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete provider "{{name}}"? Associated models will also be deleted.
provider.name: Display Name
provider.baseUrlHint: Make sure the URL ends with /v1 (if required)
provider.baseUrlConfirmV1: The current Base URL does not end with /v1. This provider type typically requires this suffix. Are you sure you want to use this configuration?
provider.baseUrlConfirmV1Beta: The current Base URL does not end with /v1 or /v1beta. This provider type typically requires this suffix. Are you sure you want to use this configuration?
provider.timeoutHint: Request timeout in milliseconds, default 300000 (5 minutes)
provider.setCacheKeyHint: Ensure a cache key is always set for this provider
provider.extraOptionsHint: Custom extra options that will be merged into provider options
provider.existingHint: Existing providers will be skipped and shown in gray

model.title: Model List
model.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete model "{{name}}"?
model.name: Model Name
model.nameOptionalPlaceholder: Leave empty to use model ID
model.variantsHint: Configure model variants like reasoning effort, text verbosity, etc.
model.modalitiesHint: Configure supported input/output types like text, image, audio, etc.

connectivity.title: Model Test - {{name}}
connectivity.customHeadersHint: These headers will be merged into the request
connectivity.customBodyHint: These fields will be merged into the request body

sync.title: Sync from Settings
sync.description: Select providers and models to sync to OpenCode configuration
sync.selectProviders: Please select at least one provider
sync.mergeDescription: If a provider with the same ID already exists in the configuration, it will be overwritten
sync.conflictDescription: Provider "{{name}}" already exists in settings, please choose an action

plugin.title: Plugin Configuration
plugin.inputPlaceholder: Enter plugin name and press Enter
plugin.emptyText: No plugins yet, type or select from common plugins

mcp.title: MCP Server Configuration
mcp.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete MCP server "{{name}}"?
mcp.commandHint: One argument per line, or space-separated
mcp.jsonHint: Supports fields like type (local/remote), command (array), url, enabled, etc.

otherConfig.title: Other Configuration
otherConfig.hint: Edit advanced settings in OpenCode config
otherConfig.autoSaveHint: Changes are saved automatically when you click outside the editor

ohMyOpenCode.title: Oh-My-OpenCode Configuration
ohMyOpenCode.configHint: Sub-agents handle specific tasks like architecture, code search, etc.
ohMyOpenCode.agentModelsHint: Specify the model for each agent (including advanced agents). Leave empty to use defaults.
ohMyOpenCode.advancedSettingsHint: Configure advanced agent parameters (temperature, top_p, prompt_append, permission, etc.). Leave empty to use defaults.
ohMyOpenCode.categoriesHint: Set models and advanced parameters for delegate_task categories. Leave empty to use defaults.
ohMyOpenCode.disabledMcpsPlaceholder: Select MCPs to disable (e.g., context7, grep_app)
ohMyOpenCode.lspConfigHint: Configure LSP servers. See official documentation for details.
ohMyOpenCode.experimentalConfigHint: Experimental features may change in future versions. Use with caution.
ohMyOpenCode.otherFieldsHint: Custom configuration fields that will be flattened and written to the top level of oh-my-opencode.json. When switching profiles, the Agents Profile fields will be deeply merged and override the global config's fields with the same name.
ohMyOpenCode.otherFieldsGlobalHint: Global other configuration, used as base configuration. Will be deeply merged and overridden by Agents Profile configuration when switching.
ohMyOpenCode.noConfigs: No configs yet. Click the button above to add
ohMyOpenCode.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete config "{{name}}"?
ohMyOpenCode.pluginRequiredHint: Please add the oh-my-opencode plugin in Plugin Configuration first to use this feature
ohMyOpenCode.pluginRequiredDesc: Oh-My-OpenCode features are disabled. Please add the oh-my-opencode plugin in the Plugin Configuration section above, then you can manage and apply configurations.
ohMyOpenCode.slimConfigHint: Select the configuration file to use
ohMyOpenCode.disabledTooltip: This config is disabled and will not be applied to files

ohMyOpenCodeSlim.pluginRequiredDesc: Oh-My-OpenCode-Slim features are disabled. Please add the oh-my-opencode-slim plugin in the Plugin Configuration section above, then you can manage and apply configurations.
